title: First blood, you're not worth playing with
body:
Our adc {Removed by Moderation}{{champion:21}} and me support{{champion:267}}  were agaisnt {{champion:86}} and {{champion:350}}.
We were getting hit pretty hard by garen's Q and yummi's slow, when garen hit lvl 2 he flashed into me with Q and E with yummi's Q and ignite. I died almost instantly and MF said something along the lines "This stupid support" after a brief moment i thought. "Well we can still win this. this is just a minor setback" but then MF said "I can't i quit i will not play anymore" and literally semi afk'd on the lane spewing curses on english and chinese also feeding the enemy team, I tried to help the others lanes but we couldn't do much with this person's quitting all hopes of victory.
This was a normal game...
(Re-posted since i couldn't remove previous screenshot that aparently should had been censor the name of the player)

replies.body:

If you have any questions or concerns about this moderation action please visit us at [the Boards Moderation Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification) or feel free to post in [Discuss the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation).

the rule should be that there has to be a screenshot or video evidence as proof but then shaming should be allowed.

people SHOULD feel ashamed for this behaviour.

> [{quoted}](name=IMelchorI,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ytzKXPVm,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2020-02-10T22:11:40.341+0000)
>
> the rule should be that there has to be a screenshot or video evidence as proof but then shaming should be allowed.
> 
> people SHOULD feel ashamed for this behaviour.

You might be surprised how easy it is to edit things out of context to make someone look bad. I mean, just look at any reality show ever. You can control the entire narrative if you have the control of editing. Besides, players have no authority anyway. Its literally pointless to name and shame. Maybe YOU would be shamed by anonymous strangers and change your behavior, but if I was a troll and there wete people talking about me on a forum I would read it with a shit eating grin going look at these morons all outraged. Hell, only like 1% or less of the playerbase even uses the forums so most of the time it would just be a circle jerk of shaming when the person youre shaming doesnt even know about it, accomplishing nothing. Its just an entirely pointless endeavor.
